description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Saleswonder Team Webinar Plugin: Create live/evergreen/automated/instant webinars, stream & Zoom Meetings | WebinarIgnition.This issue affects Webinar Plugin: Create live/evergreen/automated/instant webinars, stream & Zoom Meetings | WebinarIgnition: from n/a through 3.05.0.
